issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Install and launch QTS in Rhino
2. Click on 1387

Result: A runtime error is thrown. See attachment.
Expected: A success should be displayed.

Note: 
* Did not get a runtime error in V8 on LG Slate (3.1) 
* Bug does not appear in 1.7.5
fields.summary: Android: QTS - In Rhino, running test case 1387 throws a runtime error
fields.environment:
SDK build: 1.8.0.1.v20111216124633
Runtime: Rhino
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201112152014
OS: Mac OS X Lion
Device: Droid 1 (2.2.2)

comments.body: Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
